args.natural_language_statement: If z_1, ..., z_n are complex numbers, prove that |z_1 + z_2 + ... + z_n| ≤ |z_1| + |z_2| + ... + |z_n|. Translate into Lean4. Use Mathlib import at top and end the Lean4 statement with := by sorry.

result:

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem Rudin_exercise_1_12 {n : Nat} (z : Fin n → ℂ) :
  Complex.abs (∑ i : Fin n, z i) ≤ ∑ i : Fin n, Complex.abs (z i) := by
  sorry
